topic.fullpath: Topic :: Software Development :: Source code browsing

name: php-grep
short_description:
Web based Grep interface.
Input form allows user to select directory to search and search term. 

Fast! 
Php-Grep.php uses an extremely fast algorithm that can search over 1000 files in less than 10 seconds. Globally searches entire file then refines search to files with match.

Just one file and no setup. Simply put php-grep.php in any directory and start using!
summary: Recursively search for text in all files of a directory tree.
